Move Out 2023


Students, please be aware that the deadline to move out is 24 hours after your last final. Students who have a final on Friday of Finals Week are required to move out no later than 11:00 a.m. on May 20, 2023. Before you move out, make sure to change your mailing address, recycle, donate, and, throw away trash, and restore your residence. For more information, visit the Move Out webpage.



  






You are hereREACH Home ›  
2023-2024 Apply for New Residents






Your SSU home awaits...
We're so excited you chose to apply to live on campus at Sonoma State University. Below is a brief description of how the application process works for the 2022/2023 academic year. You're going to love living on campus, so be sure to make plans early to apply. To learn more about the available options, please view our Housing Options webpage.
How to Apply for Housing
Incoming Student
Be admitted to SSU for Fall 2023. 
Complete your Stay on Track and Intent to Enroll. 
Apply to live on campus from February - May by accessing the Housing Portal (you will need your SSU username and password)
	Apply early for the best chance of getting one of your top preferences. 
We will continue to accept applications until full.
Room assignments are first-come-first-serve

Make $300 Housing Down Payment. The $300 payment will be applied to your total housing fees for the fall semester. 
Complete the application process. 
Receive room assignment via SSU email in mid-June.
Current SSU Student Not Living On Campus During Spring 2023 
Apply to live on campus from February - May by accessing the Housing Portal (you will need your SSU username and password)

	Apply early for the best chance of getting one of your top preferences. 
We will continue to accept applications until full.
Room assignments are first-come-first-serve

Make $300 Housing Down Payment. The $300 payment will be applied to your total housing fees for the fall semester. 
Complete the application process. 
Receive room assignment via email in mid-June.
How It Works
Please note Housing Applications are accepted until capacity is reached. In the event that we reach capacity, we will continue to accept applications and payments and students will be placed on a waitlist. In the event that we are unable to house you one week after the semester begins, we will refund the payment in full.
*Financial Hardship: please contact REACH at housing@sonoma.edu if you are unable to make the Housing Down Payment in full at the time you apply.
Cancellations
If your plans change and you no longer plan to live on campus, please notify us at housing@sonoma.edu. The Housing Down Payment is 50% refundable until June 1; no refunds thereafter. Students who complete the application process and receive a room assignment will be charged $250 if they cancel after August 1 or fail to check in seven (7) days after the start of the semester.
Have Questions?
For any questions regarding the Housing Applications, please contact us at housing@sonoma.edu or (707) 664-2541.
